data.lyric:
[ti:Feels Like Summer]
[ar:Childish Gambino]
[al:Feels Like Summer]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Feels Like Summer - Childish Gambino
[00:05.70]Lyricist：Donald Glover
[00:11.40]Composer：Donald Glover/Ludwig Goransson
[00:17.10]Producer：Donald Glover/Ludwig Goransson
[00:22.81]You can feel it in the streets
[00:25.62]On a day like this the heat
[00:28.03]It feel like summer
[00:33.83]I feel like summer
[00:39.64]I feel like summer
[00:45.97]You can feel it in the streets
[00:48.77]On a day like this the heat
[00:51.03]I feel like summer
[00:56.90]She feel like summer
[01:02.62]This feel like summer
[01:08.54]I feel like summer
[01:09.92]Seven billion souls that move around the sun
[01:15.90]Rolling faster faster and not a chance to slow down
[01:26.22]Slow down
[01:33.22]Men who made machines that want what they decide
[01:38.83]They're just tryna tell the children please slow down
[01:49.39]Slow down
[01:52.32]I know
[01:54.21]Oh I know you know that pain
[02:01.98]I'm hopin' that this world will change
[02:08.57]But it just seems the same
[02:11.85]It is not the same
[02:15.56]You can feel it in the streets
[02:18.45]On a day like this the heat
[02:20.60]It feels like summer
[02:23.73]I feel like summer
[02:26.59]I feel like summer
[02:29.38]I feel like summer
[02:32.46]I feel like summer
[02:39.73]Every day gets hotter than the one before
[02:45.53]Running out of water it's about to go down
[02:56.07]Go down
[03:02.96]Air that kill the bees that we depend upon
[03:08.66]Birds were made for singing
[03:11.74]Waking up to no sound
[03:19.10]No sound
[03:22.03]I know
[03:24.01]Oh I know you know my pain
[03:31.66]I'm hopin' that this world will change
[03:38.18]But it just seems the same
[03:45.19]I know
[03:47.05]Oh I hope we change
[03:54.81]I really thought this world would change
[04:01.30]But it seems like the same
[04:08.42]I know
[04:10.20]Oh my mind is still the same
[04:17.92]I'm hoping that this world will change
[04:24.44]But it just seems the same
[04:31.52]I know
[04:33.31]Oh I hope we change
data.trans:
[ti:Feels Like Summer]
[ar:Childish Gambino]
[al:Feels Like Summer]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:05.70]//
[00:11.40]//
[00:17.10]//
[00:22.81]在街上你就能感受到
[00:25.62]这热浪翻滚的天
[00:28.03]这感觉像夏天
[00:33.83]我感觉像夏天
[00:39.64]我感觉像夏天
[00:45.97]在街上你就能感受到
[00:48.77]这热浪翻滚的天
[00:51.03]我感觉像夏天
[00:56.90]她感觉像夏天
[01:02.62]这感觉像夏天
[01:08.54]我感觉像夏天
[01:09.92]七十亿人围着太阳转
[01:15.90]转得越来越快 一点慢下来得趋势都没有
[01:26.22]慢下来
[01:33.22]有人造了机器 想要什么有什么
[01:38.83]他们不过是在叫孩子们慢下来
[01:49.39]慢下来
[01:52.32]我知道
[01:54.21]我知道你了解那种痛苦
[02:01.98]我希望这世界能有所改变
[02:08.57]但它似乎依然如此
[02:11.85]这不一样
[02:15.56]在街上你就能感受到
[02:18.45]这热浪翻滚的天
[02:20.60]这感觉像夏天
[02:23.73]我感觉像夏天
[02:26.59]我感觉像夏天
[02:29.38]我感觉像夏天
[02:32.46]我感觉像夏天
[02:39.73]一天一天 越来越热
[02:45.53]水要用完了 快要崩溃了
[02:56.07]崩溃
[03:02.96]空气杀死了我们赖以生存的蜜蜂
[03:08.66]歌唱的鸟儿也是人造的
[03:11.74]醒来听不到一点声音
[03:19.10]没有声音
[03:22.03]我知道
[03:24.01]我知道你了解我的痛苦
[03:31.66]我希望这世界能有所改变
[03:38.18]但它似乎依然如此
[03:45.19]我知道
[03:47.05]我希望我们能改变
[03:54.81]我真的以为这世界能有所改变
[04:01.30]但它似乎依然如此
[04:08.42]我知道
[04:10.20]我的思想依然如此
[04:17.92]我希望这世界能有所改变
[04:24.44]但它似乎依然如此
[04:31.52]我知道
[04:33.31]我希望我们能改变
